::Spears::
She winked at Prebon as he held her arm. She whispered to him, "Hope 
I didn't break your audio receptors." 

She then looked back towards the open and tried to put up a small 
struggle against Prebon. She moved and twisted her arm a little, but 
not enough to really free herself from him.  She screamed 
out, "PLEASE NO! DON"T KILL ME! NO! DON'T SHOOT!"  She added a slight 
tremble to her voice as she yelled. Tears started to roll down her 
cheeks. "NOO! PLEASE, NO!"


SnowCat::

she looked over and saw Spears screaming and one of the trainers had 
a gun to her head.  She had to tell herself that she couldn't pounce 
now without exposing herself to danger or getting Spears shot.  She 
didn't make a sound, she just watched and waited to see what Ramulus 
would do. But she trembled slightly at not being able to do anything 
about the situation.
